learning.unsupervised.evaluation

Class BasicClusteringEvaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.evaluation.BasicClusteringEvaluator

  • public class BasicClusteringEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used for initial algorithm testing - for more detailed testing and between-algorithm comparisons, BatchClusteringTester should be used exclusively, since it implements more options, more functionality, etc. Not everything is supported in this class.
